Define Documentation

#define PACER_INIT ( RATE   ) 

Value:

do {pit_init (); \
        pit_period_set (PIT_DIVISOR (RATE)); \
        pit_start ();} while (0)
Initialise paced loop timer. This macro should only be used externally for non-integer paced loop rates.

Referenced by pacer_init().
